text_logic_form: Find the length of the hypotenuse of the right triangle.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the length of the hypotenuse of the right triangle $ACB$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $5$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $3$ units.
The line $AC$ is perpendicular to the line $BC$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$, forming a right triangle $ACB$.
